scripts.start: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run start --prefix backend
scripts.build-all: echo '[1/5] Building frontend...' && (cd frontend && npm run build) && echo '[2/5] Building backend...' && (cd ../backend && npm run build-backend-obf) && echo '[3/5] Building Docker image...' && cd .. && docker build -t myapp:latest . && echo '[4/5] Saving image...' && docker save myapp:latest -o myapp.tar && echo '[5/5] All done!You can copy the docker-compose.yml and myapp.tar files to another machine to run the app.'
